decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to control the game by countering and removing opponent's threats, while generating card advantage and gaining life. The deck makes use of cards like Settle the Wreckage, Fumigate, Seal Away, and Cast Out to deal with the opponent's creatures. It also includes counterspells like Negate, Essence Scatter, and Disallow to counter key spells. Cards like Glimmer of Genius and Search for Azcanta provide card selection and card advantage. The deck's win condition is the combination of Teferi, Hero of Dominaria's card advantage and Torrential Gearhulk's flash and recursion abilities.

The main focus of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to quickly deploy aggressive creatures such as Rekindling Phoenix, Inventor's Apprentice, and Scrapheap Scrounger to apply pressure on the opponent. Supporting cards like Walking Ballista, Abrade, and Unlicensed Disintegration provide removal and additional damage options. Aethersphere Harvester offers some flying defense, while Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Hazoret the Fervent provide additional reach and card advantage. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced, proactive game plan while maintaining board control.

The deck focuses on quickly building up a strong board presence by playing efficient creatures and utilizing +1/+1 counters to enhance their abilities. It also includes removal spells and defensive options to protect the creatures and maintain control of the game. The mana base is designed to support the color requirements of the deck, ensuring smooth gameplay. This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and efficient creatures, while also having the flexibility to adapt to different situations through its varied card options.

The deck focuses on aggressive play with creatures like Rekindling Phoenix, Scrapheap Scrounger, and Bomat Courier to deal consistent damage to the opponent. Cards like Unlicensed Disintegration, Magma Spray, and Abrade help remove threats from the opponent's side of the board. Aetherphere Harvester provides lifelink and flying for added reach. Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Hazoret the Fervent provide additional damage and card advantage. The mana base is designed to ensure consistent casting of spells while maintaining a strong board presence.

The deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures, artifacts, and removal spells to maintain constant pressure on the opponent. By deploying powerful threats such as Karn, Scion of Urza and Rekindling Phoenix, along with efficient creatures like Earthshaker Khenra and Scrapheap Scrounger, the deck aims to quickly deplete the opponent's life total. Additionally, the inclusion of versatile removal spells like Unlicensed Disintegration and Abrade helps handle opposing threats. The deck's mana base is optimized for consistent casting of spells and ensures a steady stream of threats onto the battlefield.

The focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive red creatures and burn spells. By constantly applying pressure and dealing direct damage, it aims to quickly reduce the opponent's life total and win the game before they have a chance to stabilize. The deck is built around high-value creatures like Hazoret the Fervent and Goblin Chainwhirler, supported by efficient burn spells like Shock and Lightning Strike. The strategy is to maintain a fast tempo and force the opponent to react defensively, while steadily chipping away at their life total.

The main idea of this deck is to control the game through countering opponent's spells, removing threats from the board, and generating card advantage through card draw and recursion. By using cards like Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, Torrential Gearhulk, and Settle the Wreckage, the deck aims to maintain board control and out value the opponent. The inclusion of Search for Azcanta and Glimmer of Genius also contributes to this game plan by providing card selection and filtering. Overall, the deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy while gradually building up its own advantage.

The deck focuses on aggressive strategies using low-cost and efficient red spells and creatures to quickly deal damage to the opponent. Cards like Shock, Lightning Strike, Abrade, and Goblin Chainwhirler are used to control the board while creatures like Hazoret the Fervent and Earthshaker Khenra provide consistent pressure. Chandra, Torch of Defiance and Kari Zev, Skyship Raider offer additional card advantage and evasion. By maintaining a fast pace and overwhelming the opponent with early threats, the deck aims to win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The main focus of this red deck is to put pressure on the opponent quickly and efficiently, utilizing aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage as fast as possible. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of impactful creatures like Hazoret the Fervent and Goblin Chainwhirler, while also utilizing burn spells such as Lightning Strike and Shock to remove threats and deal direct damage to the opponent. By maintaining a high tempo and consistently applying pressure, this deck seeks to win the game in the early turns before the opponent can stabilize.

The main strategy of this deck is to establish a strong board presence using various removal spells to control the opponent's threats. The deck also utilizes card advantage and card selection tools such as Treasure Map and Search for Azcanta to maintain a steady stream of resources. The win condition of the deck is to win through attrition by out-valuing the opponent with powerful threats like Karn, Scion of Urza and The Scarab God. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements while providing the necessary fixing for a smooth gameplay experience.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively deal damage to the opponent using a combination of low-cost creatures and burn spells. By playing fast and eliminating threats efficiently, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent before they have a chance to stabilize. Cards like Hazoret the Fervent and The Flame of Keld provide additional reach and staying power, allowing the deck to maintain pressure throughout the game. The deck's strategy revolves around consistent damage output and tempo advantage to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using aggressive and efficient red creatures and burn spells. The deck is designed to control the board with removal spells like Magma Spray, Shock, and Lightning Strike while building up a fast clock with creatures like Bomat Courier, Earthshaker Khenra, and Hazoret the Fervent. Cards like Soul-Scar Mage and Goblin Chainwhirler provide additional value by weakening opponent's creatures, allowing for a more aggressive playstyle. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of burn spells and hasty creatures.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board and disrupt your opponent's game plan through counterspells, removal spells, and card draw. By utilizing cards like Hieroglyphic Illumination, Settle the Wreckage, Disallow, and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria, you can maintain control of the game and out-value your opponent. With efficient removal such as Seal Away and Cast Out, as well as card advantage engines like Search for Azcanta and Memorial to Genius, this deck aims to establish dominance and outlast your opponent until you can win with powerful finishers like Torrential Gearhulk.

The deck focuses on utilizing Gate to the Afterlife to quickly fill up your graveyard with creatures, allowing you to bring back powerful creatures with God-Pharaoh's Gift. By controlling the board with removal spells and disruptive creatures like Warkite Marauder, you can set up a strong defense while assembling your combo pieces. Champion of Wits helps with card draw and filtering the deck, while Combat Celebrant can provide additional combat steps to overwhelm your opponent. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver your opponent with powerful reanimated creatures and controlling elements.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly burn and disrupt the opponent by playing aggressive creatures and spells. The goal is to deal damage quickly and efficiently, overwhelming the opponent before they can stabilize. The deck utilizes cheap and efficient burn spells like Shock and Lightning Strike to remove threats and finish off opponents. Key creatures like Hazoret the Fervent and Rekindling Phoenix provide additional reach and resilience. Overall, the deck aims to maintain a fast pace and apply constant pressure to secure a victory.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up creatures on the board, utilizing cards like Adventurous Impulse and Merfolk Branchwalker to search for key creatures like Shalai, Voice of Plenty and Lyra Dawnbringer. Blossoming Defense and Seal Away provide protection and removal, while Walking Ballista and Rishkar, Peema Renegade offer additional utility. The deck excels at overwhelming opponents with aggressive plays while maintaining a strong board presence, ultimately aiming to close out the game with powerful flying threats like Angel of Sanctions and Lyra Dawnbringer.
